column1: Parking is very limited and is available on a first come, first
served basis. If you plan to arrive by car please arrange a parking
space as far as possible in advance by telephoning 01865 272933.
SRC="entrance.jpg" ALT="CLICK FOR LARGER SCALE MAPS" BORDER=0>
